languages.text: "Да будет так. Я изменю вселенную в одиночку. Прощай".
"So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."
languages.original_text: "Да будет так. Я изменю вселенную в одиночку. Прощай".

traits.locale_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

languages.text: “那就这样吧，我会以我自己的方式改造这个宇宙。永别了。”
languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: “那就这样吧，我会以我自己的方式改造这个宇宙。永别了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Que así sea. Transformaré el universo por mi cuenta. Adiós».
languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: «Que así sea. Transformaré el universo por mi cuenta. Adiós».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「それでいい。私は己の力で宇宙を変える。さらばだ」
languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: 「それでいい。私は己の力で宇宙を変える。さらばだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "So sei es. Ich werde das Universum selbst verwandeln. Lebt wohl."
languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "So sei es. Ich werde das Universum selbst verwandeln. Lebt wohl."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Très bien. Je transformerai l'univers sans l'aide de personne. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Je transformerai l'univers sans l'aide de personne. Adieu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

languages.text: "Öyle olsun. Evrene kendi başıma dönüşüm geçirteceğim. Hoşça kalın."
languages.original_text: "So be it. I will transform the universe on my own. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle olsun. Evrene kendi başıma dönüşüm geçirteceğim. Hoşça kalın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
